title: Minneapolis school shooting updates: FBI investigating attack as domestic terrorism and hate crime against Catholics - latest
summary: FBI Director Kash Patel addressed the tragedy involving an attacker who killed two children at a church school. However, the local police chief declined to comment on the motive behind the attack. The incident has raised significant concerns and questions within the community.

title: Top CDC officials resign as director pushed out after less than a month – US politics live
summary: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has seen top-level resignations following the departure of Susan Monarez, who was removed from her position after a short tenure. These changes raise concerns about stability and leadership at the agency. The CDC continues to face challenges in its public health mission amidst the leadership shakeup.

title: US Open tennis 2025: injured Draper withdraws, Raducanu on day four – live
summary: Cameron Norrie defeated Francisco Comesana, advancing to face Novak Djokovic in the next round. Jack Draper withdrew from the tournament, allowing Norrie to move forward. Meanwhile, Emma Raducanu had a strong victory in her match.
